scripts.analyze:archive-search: npm run build:archive-search -- --stats-json ; esbuild-visualizer --metadata dist/archive-search/stats.json --filename dist/archive-search/stats.html
scripts.analyze:collect: npm run build:collect -- --stats-json ; esbuild-visualizer --metadata dist/collect/stats.json --filename dist/collect/stats.html
scripts.analyze:design-system: npm run build:design-system -- --stats-json ; esbuild-visualizer --metadata dist/design-system/stats.json --filename dist/design-system/stats.html
scripts.analyze:identity: npm run build:identity -- --stats-json ; esbuild-visualizer --metadata dist/identity/stats.json --filename dist/identity/stats.html
scripts.analyze:ingest: npm run build:ingest -- --stats-json ; esbuild-visualizer --metadata dist/ingest/stats.json --filename dist/ingest/stats.html
scripts.analyze:pastis: npm run build:pastis -- --stats-json ; esbuild-visualizer --metadata dist/pastis/stats.json --filename dist/pastis/stats.html
scripts.analyze:portal: npm run build:portal -- --stats-json ; esbuild-visualizer --metadata dist/portal/stats.json --filename dist/portal/stats.html
scripts.analyze:referential: npm run build:referential -- --stats-json ; esbuild-visualizer --metadata dist/referential/stats.json --filename dist/referential/stats.html
scripts.build:archive-search: export NODE_OPTIONS=--max_old_space_size=2048; ng build archive-search --configuration production --base-href=/archive-search/ --deploy-url=/archive-search/
scripts.build:collect: export NODE_OPTIONS=--max_old_space_size=2048; ng build collect --configuration production --base-href=/collect/ --deploy-url=/collect/
scripts.build:design-system: export NODE_OPTIONS=--max_old_space_size=2048; ng build design-system --configuration production --base-href=/design-system/ --deploy-url=/design-system/
scripts.build:identity: export NODE_OPTIONS=--max_old_space_size=2048; ng build identity --configuration production --base-href=/identity/ --deploy-url=/identity/
scripts.build:ingest: export NODE_OPTIONS=--max_old_space_size=2048; ng build ingest --configuration production --base-href=/ingest/ --deploy-url=/ingest/
scripts.build:pastis: export NODE_OPTIONS=--max_old_space_size=2048; ng build pastis --configuration production --base-href=/pastis/ --deploy-url=/pastis/
scripts.build:portal: export NODE_OPTIONS=--max_old_space_size=2048; ng build portal --configuration production
scripts.build:referential: export NODE_OPTIONS=--max_old_space_size=2048; ng build referential --configuration production --base-href=/referential/ --deploy-url=/referential/
scripts.check:archive-search: npm run lint:archive-search && npm run test:archive-search && npm run build:archive-search
scripts.check:collect: npm run lint:collect && npm run test:collect && npm run build:collect
scripts.check:identity: npm run lint:identity && npm run test:identity && npm run build:identity
scripts.check:portal: npm run lint:portal && npm run test:portal && npm run build:portal
scripts.check:referential: npm run lint:referential && npm run test:referential && npm run build:referential
scripts.package:all: npm run package:portal &&  npm run package:identity  && npm run package:referential && npm run package:archive-search && npm run package:collect  && npm run package:pastis && npm run package:ingest
scripts.package:archive-search: mkdir -p dist/archive-search/ && cp projects/archive-search/package.json dist/archive-search/browser/package.json && npm pack dist/archive-search/browser/
scripts.package:collect: mkdir -p dist/collect/ && cp projects/collect/package.json dist/collect/browser/package.json && npm pack dist/collect/browser/
scripts.package:identity: mkdir -p dist/identity/ && cp projects/identity/package.json dist/identity/browser/package.json && npm pack dist/identity/browser/
scripts.package:ingest: mkdir -p dist/ingest/ && cp projects/ingest/package.json dist/ingest/browser/package.json && npm pack dist/ingest/browser/
scripts.package:pastis: mkdir -p dist/pastis/ && cp projects/pastis/package.json dist/pastis/browser/package.json && npm pack dist/pastis/browser/
scripts.package:portal: mkdir -p dist/portal/ && cp projects/portal/package.json dist/portal/browser/package.json && npm pack dist/portal/browser/
scripts.package:referential: mkdir -p dist/referential/ && cp projects/referential/package.json dist/referential/browser/package.json && npm pack dist/referential/browser/
scripts.publish:all: npm run publish:portal &&  npm run publish:identity  && npm run publish:referential && npm run publish:archive-search && npm run publish:collect  && npm run publish:pastis && npm run publish:ingest
scripts.publish:archive-search: cp projects/archive-search/package.json dist/archive-search/browser/package.json && npm publish dist/archive-search/browser/
scripts.publish:collect: cp projects/collect/package.json dist/collect/browser/package.json && npm publish dist/collect/browser/
scripts.publish:identity: cp projects/identity/package.json dist/identity/browser/package.json && npm publish dist/identity/browser/
scripts.publish:ingest: cp projects/ingest/package.json dist/ingest/browser/package.json && npm publish dist/ingest/browser/
scripts.publish:pastis: cp projects/pastis/package.json dist/pastis/browser/package.json && npm publish dist/pastis/browser/
scripts.publish:portal: cp projects/portal/package.json dist/portal/browser/package.json && npm publish dist/portal/browser/
scripts.publish:referential: cp projects/referential/package.json dist/referential/browser/package.json && npm publish dist/referential/browser/
